result.execSummary:
The defendant Nathaniel Inez Cruz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Waukesha County Clerk of Circuit Court

miscConds.notes:
Court costs and DNA surcharge are to be paid as a Condition of Probation.  Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

  If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

Domestic Violence Treatment if deemed necessary by Agent.
No use or possession of illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.
No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription.
No violent contact with the victim.

timeConds.notes:
Non-working hours (Huber) with Standard Release Conditions.
STAYED - to be used at Agent's discretion.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Nathaniel Inez Cruz in court with attorney Katherine Jean Graber.  Ted Szczupakiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defendant enters a plea of no contest to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty.

The Court Orders the Following:

Withheld Sentence of:

Term of Probation: 12 months

Conditions of Probation:
- Domestic Violence Treatment if necessary;
- No Use or Possession of  illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia;
- No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
- Maintain/Obtain full time employment;
- No violent contact with victim.

Costs: $343.00 
DNA Surcharge:  $200.00
DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. 
(To be paid as a condition of probation.)

Condition Time: 15 days Huber NON WORKING HOURS WITH STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS - Stayed to be used at the agent's discretion.

Appeal Rights given.
